summary: Conejito\'s retexture added as a separate armor set.
descriptionHtml:
This mod takes the Nightingale Female Pink Camo texture by Conejito and creates a seperate set of armor from it, preserving the original. 
- Note that since this is a female-only texture mod, males should simply get vanilla Nightingale armor should they put it on.

The chest is found inside Nightingale Hall, in the same room you get the the original armor.

It is in an expert locked chest, but of course if you made it that far into the thieves guild quest line, that shouldn\'t be too difficult.

Since I did not create them and did not ask for permission to use them, this file does NOT include the texture files, you will have to get them from the original mod here:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2316

There are four dds files included in that mod, all of which should be renamed to add _pink to the end of the file name, otherwise this mod will have no texture.

eg: nightingalearmorglovesm.dds becomes nightingalearmorglovesm_pink.dds

--------------------------------
This is my first mod and while I believe I included everything necessary (except the textures, as detailed above), do let me know if there are any problems.
author: SolarSystem
